Instruction: Pit the green olives if necessary, then finely chop them.
In a bowl, combine the chopped green olives, minced garlic, extra virgin olive oil, chopped fresh parsley, lemon zest, red pepper flakes, salt, and black pepper.
Mix well until all ingredients are evenly combined.
Cover and refrigerate the tapenade for at least 1 hour to allow the flavors to meld.
Before serving, let the tapenade come to room temperature.
Serve as a flavorful spread for bread or crackers.
